Week 2 Announcement

Jan 27
  1. Welcome to back to the second week of classes! See Week 02 Announcements on Ed.
  2. Office hours start this week at Warren 101B!
  3. We’ve released the Data Scholars Interest Form
  4. Project 0 is due Friday 2/7 at 5pm.
  5. Homework 1 will be released on Gradescope on Friday 1/31 and is due on Wednesday 2/12 at 5pm.
  6. Lecture attendance starts this week!
  7. Discussion sections will start on Thursday and Friday. You can find specific hours on the calendar.

Week 1 Announcement

Jan 20
  1. Welcome to Data 101!
  2. Sections start next Thursday 1/30 and Friday 1/31. Join us for a review of SQL, and meet some study partners!
    1. Sections times/locations will be updated on the calendar by the end of the weekend calendar
  3. Office hours start next week! You can find the times and locations on the calendar.
  4. Please make sure to check the “Welcome to Data C101 / Info 258!” post on Ed! This details the Pre-Semester survey and other logistics.
  5. Check out our cool new logo (top left) designed by one of our TA’s, Li!
